content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to furnace production
- Ensure that all furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate. Currently, some furnaces are showing "no ingredients to smelt" warnings. Check the input materials and ensure they are properly supplied.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
